class_notes:
(Same as AAS 215 1)
(Music majors: This course counts as a Category B)
course_description: Critical and analytic study of jazz idioms from the turn of the century to the present, including the blues, ragtime, Dixieland, swing, bop, and modern jazz. Emphasis on such figures as Armstrong, Ellington, Parker, Monk, and Coleman.
schedule_location: TTh 11:30am-12:45pm in BRB Performing Arts Studio
sections: Class Nbr: 3013, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: D. Andrews, Status: Open
